data.title: Xero Masterclass Workshops
data.meta_description: BDO's Xero Masterclass sessions are designed to boost your business by providing you with accounting and technical knowledge.
data.text:
Grow and develop your understanding of your Xero account

The Xero Masterclass series designed to help you boost your business. This three-step course has been designed by Chartered Accountants with years of Xero experience to provide you with the accounting and technical knowledge needed to gain visibility and efficiencies around your business for quality decision making.

Whether you have just started using Xero or have learnt the ropes for a period of time, each class will grow and develop your understanding of the accounting system and the positive benefits to your workplace. You will be equipped with the skillset to speed up daily processes, differentiate your business and generate customised reporting to suit your specific needs.
